Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
spss.project.backend.order.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
This class provides methods for working with the orders in the system

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor

    Constructs a new order service.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderService

      protected OrderService()
      Constructs a new order service. This constructor is protected to prevent direct instantiation.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public Order save(String studentId, String printerId, String documentId, String paperSize, List<Integer> pageNumbers, int numberOfCopies, boolean singleSided, LocalDateTime timeOrdered, boolean done) throws jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException, Exception
      Saves a new order in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the id of the student who submitted the order
      printerId - the id of the printer on which the document was printed
      documentId - the id of the document which was printed
      paperSize - the size of the paper the document was printed on
      pageNumbers - the page numbers of the document which were printed
      numberOfCopies - the number of copies of the document which were printed
      singleSided - whether the document was printed single or double sided
      timeOrdered - the time at which the order was submitted
      done - whether the order has been completed
      Returns:
      the saved order
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while saving the order
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException

    • getStudentOrders

      public List<Order> getStudentOrders(String studentId) throws Exception
      Finds all orders which were submitted by the given student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the id of the student to find the orders for
      Returns:
      the orders of the student, sorted by the time at which the orders were submitted in descending order
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the orders

    • getPrinterOrders

      public List<Order> getPrinterOrders(String printerId) throws Exception
      Finds all orders which were submitted to the given printer and have not yet been printed.
      Parameters:
      printerId - the id of the printer to find the orders for
      Returns:
      the orders of the printer which have not yet been printed, sorted by the time at which the orders were submitted in descending order
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the orders

    • getOrder

      public Order getOrder(String orderId) throws Exception
      Finds an order by its id.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of the order to find
      Returns:
      the order with the given id, or null if no such order exists
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the order

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder(String orderId) throws Exception
      Deletes an order by its id.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of the order to delete
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while deleting the order

    • updateOrderStatus

      public Order updateOrderStatus(String orderId, boolean done) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException, Exception
      Updates the status of an order to indicate whether or not it has been successfully printed.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of the order to update
      done - whether the order has been successfully printed
      Returns:
      the updated order
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the order with the given id does not exist
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the order

    • getRepo

      public OrderRepository getRepo()
      Gets the repository for accessing and manipulating the orders.
      Returns:
      the repository for the orders
